H0.text: Whose third symphony is also called his ‘organ symphony’. Beethoven

H1.text: Whose third symphony is also called his ‘organ symphony’. Brahms

H2.text: Whose third symphony is also called his ‘organ symphony’. Bruckner

H3.text: Whose third symphony is also called his ‘organ symphony’. Saint Saen

A4.text: The Symphony No. 3 in C minor, Op. 78, was completed by Camille Saint-Saëns in 1886 and is popularly known as the Organ Symphony

A5.text: The composer inscribed it as: Symphonie No. 3 'avec orgue' (with organ)
